data.name: EditMsg
data.value:
如果您的任何一条信息是不正确的，请点击按键回到相关页面及时纠正。
当您确认所填内容全部正确时，请点击“打印乐购会员卡”以便创建您的全新乐购会员帐户和打印您的临时乐购会员卡。
通过这样做，您选择同意乐购会员卡的全部条款通则。

data.name: TCLine1
data.value: These terms and conditions, in conjunction with the privacy policy, are applicable across the entire Tesco Clubcard scheme and any participation is considered as acceptance. Additional terms and conditions may be in place for optional elements of the scheme, examples of which include, but are not limited to, Christmas Savers, Club Membership, and Clubcard Rewards. Members participating in the optional elements of the scheme will be considered as having accepted the additional terms and conditions.

data.name: TCLine2
data.value: The Clubcard account, card, key fobs, coupons, vouchers and points, in whatever form, are issued by and remain the property of Tesco which may, at any time, terminate the scheme or alter or amend the conditions of operation of the scheme.

data.name: TCLine3
data.value: All members of the scheme must be resident in the UK and aged 18 years or over.

data.name: TCLine4
data.value: Members are only entitled to one Clubcard account each. Tesco reserves the right to refuse, merge or close additional accounts at any time.

data.name: Name2Error
data.value: Please note Middle Initial is required, or the entered name is not valid.

data.name: SignUpCancelledMsg
data.value: 此会员卡申请已被取消。

data.name: AddressNotFound
data.value: Sorry but we couldn't find any addresses for the postcode

data.name: EnterManually
data.value: . Please enter the Address details manually.

data.name: ProfinityErrorMsg
data.value: There was a problem with your registration. Please check that the information you have entered is correct. If you require further assistance, please contact the customer helpdesk on 0800 59 16 88.

data.name: InvalidPostcode
data.value: Sorry but we couldn't find any addresses for the postcode

data.name: AddressLine2Error
data.value: Please enter a valid Street name.

data.name: AddressLine3Error
data.value: Please enter a valid Town name.

data.name: AddressLine4Error
data.value: Please enter a valid Town name.

data.name: AddressLine5Error
data.value: Please enter a valid Town name.

data.name: AddressLine6Error
data.value: Please enter a valid Town name.

data.name: TCLine10
data.value: The scheme is only for personal and consumer use. Clubcard cards and key fobs cannot be used for any business transaction or purpose.

data.name: TCLine11
data.value: Clubcard accounts, cards, key fobs, coupons, points and vouchers cannot be transferred, bought, sold or in any way traded.

data.name: TCLine12
data.value: Two members who live at and have accounts registered at the same address may join their accounts together. Joint accounts may be split into single accounts by either member and any points accrued will be divided based on the Clubcard card or key fobs with which they were originally earned. Tesco will take no responsibility for the allocation of vouchers that have already been issued.

data.name: TCLine13
data.value: Members can choose to leave the scheme at any time. By leaving the scheme members forfeit the right to any points or vouchers already accrued or issued.

data.name: TCLine14
data.value: Members who do not collect any points for two years will be removed from the scheme and will need to reapply for new membership should they wish to rejoin.

data.name: TCLine15
data.value: Members may inherit the points or vouchers of a family member who has died by providing a written request informing us of the membership details of the deceased.

data.name: TCLine5
data.value: Members must register their personal details and keep Tesco informed of any changes. Tesco cannot be held responsible for any loss of points or vouchers incurred as a result of out of date details. New accounts that are not registered within two years of first being used and accounts with out of date details that have not been updated for two years will be removed and any points or vouchers forfeited.

data.name: TCLine6
data.value: The Clubcard card, in whatever form, is not transferable, cannot be copied and can only be used by the member who is named and registered for the card. Clubcard key fobs may be used by anyone who is resident at the same registered address.

data.name: TCLine7
data.value: Clubcard cards, key fobs, coupons and vouchers remain the responsibility of the Clubcard member, as do any security details relating to the account. Tesco cannot be held responsible for any loss arising from the member failing to ensure the safe-keeping of these items.

data.name: TCLine8
data.value:
Tesco may decline to issue, withdraw or cancel Clubcard accounts, cards, key fobs, coupons, vouchers and points, in whatever form, and / or remove a member from the scheme at any time where there is reasonable belief of:

    a. any abuse or attempted abuse of the scheme;

    b. any breach or attempted breach of these terms and conditions and / or those relating to the optional elements of the scheme;

    c. any behaviour relating to Clubcard or the Tesco Group that involves theft, misconduct, abusive or offensive behaviour, or supplying false or     misleading information.

data.name: TCLine9
data.value: Clubcard cards and key fobs can only be used for purchases from Tesco and promotional partners who are part of the scheme.

data.name: Message1
data.value: 打印您的临时乐购会员卡

data.name: Message2
data.value: 打印您的临时乐购会员卡

data.name: Message3
data.value: 打印遇到问题? 请前往客服柜台咨询。

data.name: CC1Line1
data.value: 感谢您在乐购门店购物。为了回馈您的支持，并保持与您的密切沟通，我们推出了乐购会员卡方案。在各家门店使用乐购会员卡可进行积分，即可享受诸多优惠。 我们将悉心保护您的个人资料。对此我们特地制定了会员章程。

data.name: CC1Line2
data.value: We know you expect us to take great care with your personal details and that's why we created the Clubcard Customer Charter to tell you how we protect your privacy.

data.name: CC1Line3
data.value: We would like to reassure you that your personal details are safe with us and will never be released to companies outside the Tesco Group for their marketing purposes.

data.name: CC1Line4
data.value: Your personal details will be used to send you your Clubcard statement and any vouchers you've earned together with relevant coupons and information which we hope you'll find useful.

data.name: CC2Line1
data.value: We may also use your personal details to provide you with a better service and to make shopping at Tesco easier.

data.name: CC2Line2
data.value: We may send you relevant offers and information for products and services provided by Tesco and our partners. We'll take great care to make sure we don't contact you too often and that the offers and information will be of interest to you.

data.name: CC2Line3
data.value: Of course, if you've told us that you don't want to receive these offers and information, then we will respect your wishes. However, this means you could be missing out on some of the major benefits of Clubcard, such as money-off coupons and exclusive offers.

data.name: CC2Line4
data.value: We comply strictly with relevant data protection legislation. For further information please see our terms & conditions.

data.name: TC2Line1
data.value: Members must present their Clubcard card or key fob at the checkout in order to collect points for a transaction in store. Members who forget to do this may have their points added manually up to 14 days after the transaction upon production of a valid receipt, providing the receipt belongs to the claiming member and is based on their personal spend. Points may only be claimed for up to two receipts per day.

data.name: TC2Line10
data.value: Tesco is entitled to remove points at any time if products are returned for any reason and a full or partial refund of the purchase price is given. This also applies to the exchange of products, unless the exchange is for products with an equivalent points value.

data.name: TC2Line11
data.value: Points awarded at the time of the transaction or vouchers already issued may be removed or cancelled if Tesco determines that the points were collected in breach of these terms and conditions or were awarded in error. For the avoidance of doubt, any advice or actions of our staff that is contrary to these terms and conditions will not have the effect of changing these terms and conditions.

data.name: TC2Line12
data.value: Points have no value until converted into vouchers at the end of the collection period. The current conversion value of points is one point equals one penny.

data.name: TC2Line13
data.value: Tesco is under no obligation to award Clubcard points for any reason outside of qualifying transactions.

data.name: TC2Line2
data.value: Members will be required to quote their Clubcard number to collect points on purchases made through any catalogue, phone, partner or online transaction.

data.name: TC2Line3
data.value: Points collected from Tesco Bank will be credited to the Clubcard member's account and converted separately to points collected elsewhere.

data.name: TC2Line4
data.value: Points collected on additional cards or key fobs linked to the main Clubcard member's account will be credited to that account.

data.name: TC2Line5
data.value: To be awarded points, members must spend above a certain amount on qualifying products in a single transaction. The amount of points awarded may change and will vary depending on the products bought, the amount spent and where the transaction takes place. Full details of how points are awarded can be found at the end of how points are awarded can be found here.

data.name: TC2Line6
data.value: Where points can be collected with partners further terms and conditions may apply.

data.name: TC2Line7
data.value: Points will not be awarded for non-qualifying products, including tobacco or tobacco related products, lottery, stamps, prescription medicines, infant formulae milk, Tesco Gift Cards, saving stamps, Esso fuel, in store concessions, Paypoint payments or for purchases of some Tesco Bank products. Other products may also be excluded from the scheme at the discretion of Tesco.

data.name: TC2Line8
data.value: Members can earn a maximum of 30,000 points in any one collection period.

data.name: TC2Line9
data.value: Tesco may set a limit on the number of times points may be awarded for promotional items on which additional points are available. Individual promotions may have different limits as communicated in their purchase conditions. Any participation in promotional offers above and beyond what could objectively be considered consumer behaviour or personal use may be considered as abuse of the scheme.

data.name: TC3Line1
data.value: Clubcard vouchers will be sent with a statement to members who have accumulated a combined total above the qualifying threshold by the end of each collection period. The current qualifying threshold is 150 points.

data.name: TC3Line10
data.value: Where indicated, further information can be found online at www.tesco.com/clubcard/terms.asp or by calling Clubcard customer services on 0800 59 16 88.

data.name: TC3Line2
data.value: The value of Clubcard vouchers given by Tesco and Tesco Bank will be based on the number of points that a member has collected by the end of the last day of a collection period. Collection periods may vary.

data.name: TC3Line3
data.value: Points that cannot be converted into Clubcard vouchers because they are below the qualifying threshold or points that remain following conversion will be 'carried forward' as the starting balance(s) for the next collection period. 'Carried forward' points will expire after two years if the account has not been used within this period.

data.name: TC3Line4
data.value: Clubcard vouchers are valid for two years from date of issue and are accompanied by an expiry date, beyond which they cannot be used or reissued. Vouchers that are lost or mislaid may be reissued with the original expiry date, providing they have not previously been redeemed. Additional terms and conditions may be found on the back of the vouchers.

data.name: TC3Line6
data.value: The promoter of Tesco Clubcard is Tesco Stores Limited, Tesco House, PO Box 18, Delamare Road, Cheshunt, Hertfordshire, EN8 9SL.

data.name: TC3Line7
data.value: These terms and conditions replace all previous versions, are correct as of December 2010 and shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England, and any disputes will be decided only by the English courts. Tesco reserves the right to change these, at any time, on reasonable notice for legal, regulatory, business or policy reasons. Members who continue to participate in the scheme following such a change will be considered to have accepted the updated terms and conditions.

data.name: TC3Line8
data.value: A person who is not a party to these terms and conditions shall have no right under the Contract (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999 to enforce any term of these terms and conditions, but this shall not affect any right or remedy of a third party which exists or is available apart from that Act.

data.name: TC3Line9
data.value: Due to printing lead times, the terms and conditions in store may not reflect the most recent changes. These are the most up to date terms and conditions.

请点击“打印临时会员卡”创建全新会员帐户并打印您的临时会员卡。此项步骤表示您接受乐购会员章程。

我们会时不时的与您联系并提供您和您的家人有可能感兴趣的产品信息及服务

data.name: TCPage1
data.value:
Terms & Conditions

  The Scheme

  1. These terms and conditions, in conjunction with the privacy policy, are applicable across the entire Tesco Clubcard scheme and any participation is considered as acceptance. Additional terms and conditions may be in place for optional elements of the scheme, examples of which include, but are not limited to, Christmas Savers, Club Membership, and Clubcard Rewards. Members participating in the optional elements of the scheme will be considered as having accepted the additional terms and conditions.
  2. The Clubcard account, card, key fobs, coupons, vouchers and points, in whatever form, are issued by and remain the property of Tesco which may, at any time, terminate the scheme or alter or amend the conditions of operation of the scheme.
  3. All members of the scheme must be resident in the UK and aged 18 years or over.
  4. Members are only entitled to one Clubcard account each. Tesco reserves the right to refuse, merge or close additional accounts at any time.
  5. Members must register their personal details and keep Tesco informed of any changes. Tesco cannot be held responsible for any loss of points or vouchers incurred as a result of out of date details. New accounts that are not registered within two years of first being used and accounts with out of date details that have not been updated for two years will be removed and any points or vouchers forfeited.
  6. The Clubcard card, in whatever form, is not transferable, cannot be copied and can only be used by the member who is named and registered for the card. Clubcard key fobs may be used by anyone who is resident at the same registered address.
  7. Clubcard cards, key fobs, coupons and vouchers remain the responsibility of the Clubcard member, as do any security details relating to the account. Tesco cannot be held responsible for any loss arising from the member failing to ensure the safe-keeping of these items.
  8. Tesco may decline to issue, withdraw or cancel Clubcard accounts, cards, key fobs, coupons, vouchers and points, in whatever form, and / or remove a member from the scheme at any time where there is reasonable belief of:

      a. any abuse or attempted abuse of the scheme;

      b. any breach or attempted breach of these terms and conditions and / or those relating to the optional elements of the scheme;

      c. any behaviour relating to Clubcard or the Tesco Group that involves theft, misconduct, abusive or offensive behaviour, or supplying false or     misleading information.

  9. Clubcard cards and key fobs can only be used for purchases from Tesco and promotional partners who are part of the scheme.
  10. The scheme is only for personal and consumer use. Clubcard cards and key fobs cannot be used for any business transaction or purpose.
  11. Clubcard accounts, cards, key fobs, coupons, points and vouchers cannot be transferred, bought, sold or in any way traded.
  12. Two members who live at and have accounts registered at the same address may join their accounts together. Joint accounts may be split into single accounts by either member and any points accrued will be divided based on the Clubcard card or key fobs with which they were originally earned. Tesco will take no responsibility for the allocation of vouchers that have already been issued.
  13. Members can choose to leave the scheme at any time. By leaving the scheme members forfeit the right to any points or vouchers already accrued or issued.
  14. Members who do not collect any points for two years will be removed from the scheme and will need to reapply for new membership should they wish to rejoin.
  15. Members may inherit the points or vouchers of a family member who has died by providing a written request informing us of the membership details of the deceased.

data.name: KeepTempCardMsg
data.value: Keep this safe until your new |c||

data.name: TCPage2
data.value:
Terms & Conditions

  Points

  1. Members must present their Clubcard card or key fob at the checkout in order to collect points for a transaction in store. Members who forget to do this may have their points added manually up to 14 days after the transaction upon production of a valid receipt, providing the receipt belongs to the claiming member and is based on their personal spend. Points may only be claimed for up to two receipts per day.
  2. Members will be required to quote their Clubcard number to collect points on purchases made through any catalogue, phone, partner or online transaction.
  3. Points collected from Tesco Bank will be credited to the Clubcard member's account and converted separately to points collected elsewhere.
  4. Points collected on additional cards or key fobs linked to the main Clubcard member's account will be credited to that account.
  5. To be awarded points, members must spend above a certain amount on qualifying products in a single transaction. The amount of points awarded may change and will vary depending on the products bought, the amount spent and where the transaction takes place. Full details of how points are awarded can be found at the end of how points are awarded can be found here.
  6. Where points can be collected with partners further terms and conditions may apply.
  7. Points will not be awarded for non-qualifying products, including tobacco or tobacco related products, lottery, stamps, prescription medicines, infant formulae milk, Tesco Gift Cards, saving stamps, Esso fuel, in store concessions, Paypoint payments or for purchases of some Tesco Bank products. Other products may also be excluded from the scheme at the discretion of Tesco.
  8. Members can earn a maximum of 30,000 points in any one collection period.
  9. Tesco may set a limit on the number of times points may be awarded for promotional items on which additional points are available. Individual promotions may have different limits as communicated in their purchase conditions. Any participation in promotional offers above and beyond what could objectively be considered consumer behaviour or personal use may be considered as abuse of the scheme.
  10. Tesco is entitled to remove points at any time if products are returned for any reason and a full or partial refund of the purchase price is given. This also applies to the exchange of products, unless the exchange is for products with an equivalent points value.
  11. Points awarded at the time of the transaction or vouchers already issued may be removed or cancelled if Tesco determines that the points were collected in breach of these terms and conditions or were awarded in error. For the avoidance of doubt, any advice or actions of our staff that is contrary to these terms and conditions will not have the effect of changing these terms and conditions.
  12. Points have no value until converted into vouchers at the end of the collection period. The current conversion value of points is one point equals one penny.
  13. Tesco is under no obligation to award Clubcard points for any reason outside of qualifying transactions.

data.name: TCPage3
data.value:
Terms & Conditions

  Vouchers

  1. Clubcard vouchers will be sent with a statement to members who have accumulated a combined total above the qualifying threshold by the end of each collection period. The current qualifying threshold is 150 points.
  2. The value of Clubcard vouchers given by Tesco and Tesco Bank will be based on the number of points that a member has collected by the end of the last day of a collection period. Collection periods may vary.
  3. Points that cannot be converted into Clubcard vouchers because they are below the qualifying threshold or points that remain following conversion will be 'carried forward' as the starting balance(s) for the next collection period. 'Carried forward' points will expire after two years if the account has not been used within this period.
  4. Clubcard vouchers are valid for two years from date of issue and are accompanied by an expiry date, beyond which they cannot be used or reissued. Vouchers that are lost or mislaid may be reissued with the original expiry date, providing they have not previously been redeemed. Additional terms and conditions may be found on the back of the vouchers.

  General

  1. The promoter of Tesco Clubcard is Tesco Stores Limited, Tesco House, PO Box 18, Delamare Road, Cheshunt, Hertfordshire, EN8 9SL.
  2. These terms and conditions replace all previous versions, are correct as of December 2010 and shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England, and any disputes will be decided only by the English courts. Tesco reserves the right to change these, at any time, on reasonable notice for legal, regulatory, business or policy reasons. Members who continue to participate in the scheme following such a change will be considered to have accepted the updated terms and conditions.
  3. A person who is not a party to these terms and conditions shall have no right under the Contract (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999 to enforce any term of these terms and conditions, but this shall not affect any right or remedy of a third party which exists or is available apart from that Act.
  4. Due to printing lead times, the terms and conditions in store may not reflect the most recent changes. These are the most up to date terms and conditions.
  5. Where indicated, further information can be found online at www.tesco.com/clubcard/terms.asp or by calling Clubcard customer services on 0800 59 16 88.

data.value:
Terms & Conditions

  Dummy Text`

data.name: CCPage1
data.value:
会员章程

感谢您在乐购门店购物。为了回馈您的支持，并保持与您的密切沟通，我们推出了乐购会员卡方案。在各家门店使用乐购会员卡可进行积分，即可享受诸多优惠。 我们将悉心保护您的个人资料。对此我们特地制定了会员章程。

We know you expect us to take great care with your personal details and that's why we created the Clubcard Customer Charter to tell you how we protect your privacy.

We would like to reassure you that your personal details are safe with us and will never be released to companies outside the Tesco Group for their marketing purposes.

Your personal details will be used to send you your Clubcard statement and any vouchers you've earned together with relevant coupons and information which we hope you'll find useful.

data.name: CCPage2
data.value:
Clubcard Customer Charter

We may also use your personal details to provide you with a better service and to make shopping at Tesco easier.

We may send you relevant offers and information for products and services provided by Tesco and our partners. We'll take great care to make sure we don't contact you too often and that the offers and information will be of interest to you.

Of course, if you've told us that you don't want to receive these offers and information, then we will respect your wishes. However, this means you could be missing out on some of the major benefits of Clubcard, such as money-off coupons and exclusive offers.

We comply strictly with relevant data protection legislation. For further information please see our terms & conditions.

data.name: CCPage3
data.value:
Clubcard Customer Charter3 Dummy Text

Clubcard is all about helping you get the most out of our products and services and is our way of saying thank you for shopping at Tesco.

We know you expect us to take great care with your personal details and that's why we created the Clubcard Customer Charter to tell you how we protect your privacy.

We would like to reassure you that your personal details are safe with us and will never be released to companies outside the Tesco Group for their marketing purposes.

Your personal details will be used to send you your Clubcard statement and any vouchers you've earned together with relevant coupons and information which we hope you'll find useful.

data.name: CCPage4
data.value:
Clubcard Customer Charter 4 Dummy

Clubcard is all about helping you get the most out of our products and services and is our way of saying thank you for shopping at Tesco.

We know you expect us to take great care with your personal details and that's why we created the Clubcard Customer Charter to tell you how we protect your privacy.

We would like to reassure you that your personal details are safe with us and will never be released to companies outside the Tesco Group for their marketing purposes.

Your personal details will be used to send you your Clubcard statement and any vouchers you've earned together with relevant coupons and information which we hope you'll find useful.

data.name: CCPage5
data.value:
Clubcard Customer Charter 5 Dummy

We may also use your personal details to provide you with a better service and to make shopping at Tesco easier.

We may send you relevant offers and information for products and services provided by Tesco and our partners. We'll take great care to make sure we don't contact you too often and that the offers and information will be of interest to you.

Of course, if you've told us that you don't want to receive these offers and information, then we will respect your wishes. However, this means you could be missing out on some of the major benefits of Clubcard, such as money-off coupons and exclusive offers.

We comply strictly with relevant data protection legislation. For further information please see our terms & conditions.
